requirements.summary: Restore the codebase to the exact state of Version 54, removing all features and changes introduced in versions 55-59
acceptanceCriteria: All files match the Version 54 snapshot
Features added after Version 54 are completely removed

file_operations.description: Remove the documentation file describing the Version 54 revert as it is no longer needed
Remove the mobile keyboard focus QA checklist that was added after Version 54
Remove the StableDialogContent component that was added after Version 54 for mobile keyboard focus handling
Revert dialog implementations to use standard Radix DialogContent instead of StableDialogContent. Remove any mobile keyboard focus handling code and restore the Version 54 form behavior
Revert dialog implementations to use standard Radix DialogContent instead of StableDialogContent. Remove any mobile keyboard focus handling code and restore the Version 54 form behavior

Revert dialog implementations to use standard Radix DialogContent instead of StableDialogContent if StableDialogContent is used. Remove any mobile keyboard focus handling code and restore the Version 54 form behavior
Remove any mobile keyboard focus handling features added after Version 54 and restore original form behavior

requirements.summary: Remove the StableDialogContent component and all its usages, reverting dialogs to standard DialogContent from Radix UI
acceptanceCriteria: All dialog implementations use standard Radix DialogContent
No references to StableDialogContent remain in the codebase

file_operations.description: Delete the StableDialogContent component file completely

Replace all StableDialogContent imports and usages with standard DialogContent from @radix-ui/react-dialog or shadcn Dialog component. Update property add/edit dialogs to use DialogContent without custom focus handling

Replace all StableDialogContent imports and usages with standard DialogContent from @radix-ui/react-dialog or shadcn Dialog component. Update inquiry add/edit dialogs to use DialogContent without custom focus handling

Replace all StableDialogContent imports and usages with standard DialogContent from @radix-ui/react-dialog or shadcn Dialog component if present. Update agent add/edit dialogs to use DialogContent without custom focus handling

requirements.summary: Remove mobile keyboard focus handling features from property and inquiry forms
acceptanceCriteria: Dialog forms behave as they did in Version 54
No special mobile keyboard focus tracking is present

file_operations.description: Remove the QA checklist documentation for mobile keyboard focus handling
Remove any special mobile keyboard focus tracking state, handlers, or effects from property forms. Restore forms to their Version 54 state without focus prevention logic
Remove any special mobile keyboard focus tracking state, handlers, or effects from inquiry forms. Restore forms to their Version 54 state without focus prevention logic
Remove any special mobile keyboard focus tracking state, handlers, or effects from agent forms. Restore forms to their Version 54 state without focus prevention logic

requirements.summary: Remove DRAFT_STATE.md documentation file that describes the Version 54 revert
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/DRAFT_STATE.md is deleted from the project

file_operations.description: Delete the DRAFT_STATE.md documentation file from the frontend directory
